createButton.name: Save
createButton.error: An error occurred when creating the content

copyLanguage.bottomText: When clicking "APPLY" you will overwrite all fields with the newly chosen language.
copyLanguage.dialogSubTitle: "Copy from" allows you to copy ALL content fields from another language into the current language.
copyLanguage.name: Copy from languages

save.name: Save
save.error: An error occurred when saving the content

validation.modalMessage: There is one validation error in the form.
validation.modalMessage_plural: There are {{count}} validation errors in the form.

goBack.name: Back to {{parentNodeDisplayName}}

edit.title: Unsaved changes
edit.message: There are unsaved changes. What do you want to do with them before closing?

create.title: Unsaved content
create.message: The content is not yet saved. What do you want to do before closing?

goBack.alert: Changes that you made will not be saved.

workInProgress.checkboxSubLabel: The content can be published in all languages.
workInProgress.dialogSubTitle: Mark your content as work in progress to prevent the publication of your content. To find out more about Work in progress
workInProgress.localizedPropertiesOnlySubText: The content won't be publishable in the selected languages. However, properties that are shared by all languages can be part of a publication.
workInProgress.allContentSubText: This option prevents publication in any language.

usages.noneDescription: This element is not referenced by any other content.

contentPicker.modalEditorialTitle: Select pages and contents displayable in full page

errors.invalidDate: Please provide a valid date value
errors.invalidColor: Please provide a valid color code
errors.invalidPattern: The value does not match the constraints defined in the content type definitions file.
errors.invalidSystemName: System name cannot consist of special characters such as '/:*?"<>|%'
errors.alreadyExist: An item with the same system name already exists, please choose another one.

error.constraintViolations: There are some validation errors! Correct the inputs and save again
error.accessDenied: Some content cannot be displayed because of permissions that were applied
error.cannotOpen: Content Editor could not be opened
error.notFound: The content does not exist or you do not have permission to see it

preview.contentNotFound: Content cannot be previewed in the page

fields.systemNameDescription: {{maxNameSize}} characters maximum. Used to build the URL for pages if no vanity URL is set in advanced options.
fields.systemNameDescriptionReadOnly: The system name cannot be changed.

listAndOrdering.title: Content list & ordering
listAndOrdering.description: Activate automatic list ordering to order your sub-content items using a maximum of three criteria, or reorder your sub-contents items manually, using drag and drop.

listSizeLimit.name: Number of items
listSizeLimit.description: Set a maximum number of items to be displayed/created in this area. Deactivate to remove any limit. If the list already contains more items than the limit, these items are simply not displayed, they are not deleted.

publicationStatusTooltip.mandatoryLanguageUnpublishable: Content cannot be published in the current language because of a missing mandatory property
publicationStatusTooltip.mandatoryLanguageValid: Content will be visible in live once published in all the mandatory languages.
publicationStatusTooltip.conflict: Content with the same name already exists in live and won't be part of this publication

warnings.content: The content shall be edited from the directly Edit tab. However, if you really need to, you can use the legacy interface to edit it. But be aware that this interface will be removed in a future update.
warnings.options: The additional options can be edited directly from the Edit tab. However, if you really need to, you can use the legacy interface to edit them. But be aware that this interface will be removed in a future update.
warnings.categories: The categories associated to the content can be edited directly from the Edit tab. However, if you really need to, you can use the legacy interface to edit them. But be aware that this interface will be removed in a future update.
warnings.metadata: The description, keywords and tag can be edited directly from the Edit tab. However, if you really need to, you can use the legacy interface to edit them. But be aware that this interface will be removed in a future update.
warnings.layout: The layout options can be edited directly from the Edit tab. However, if you really need to, you can use the legacy interface to edit them. But be aware that this interface will be removed in a future update.

vanityTab.title: Vanity URLs
vanityTab.label: Vanity URLs can be managed through a dedicated feature, available in the "3 dots icon" button in the toolbar, or using the Manage vanity URLs button below.

rightPanel.actionsCaption: Non-selectable items are not listed in this view

color.description: Enter hexadecimal code or select color visually

picker.description: Pick medias, files or content items

dateTimePicker.description: Select date and time from a calendar

datePicker.description: Select a date from a calendar

category.description: Select a value from a tree

tag.description: Select from a list of existing values or create new ones

multipleLeftRightSelector.description: Alternative to multiple dropdown when there are many values to select
